item.description: «If I can learn, even a little, I’m interested.» I’m Adolfo Loewenthal, also known as «GriffithVIII» on the internet. A self-taught person, my bases are C# and MIPS, languages I learned by experimenting on projects involving reverse engineering. I never had an academic training, my foray into this world took place with TraduSquare, a non-profit community of fantranslators, where I have collaborated and learned in programming, reverse engineering and graphic editing.
